Class SpreadSheet

java.lang.Object

public class SpreadSheet
extends java.lang.Object

This class facilitates SpreadSheet access.

SpreadSheet

public SpreadSheet(java.lang.String fname,
                   int sheetnum)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   jxl.read.biff.BiffException
Creates a SpreadSheet object, opens the specified spreadsheet and accesses the first sheet in the file

Parameters:
fname - the name of the spreadsheet file to be read
sheetnum - the number of the sheet to read. Starts at 0
Throws:
java.io.IOException
jxl.read.biff.BiffException
